# Chamber of Guidance (WondArch)
## Overview
**Chamber of Guidance:** Anyone who speaks the proper command word (usually engraved on a wall) while in this chamber receives a +1 competence bonus on a single attack roll, saving throw, or skill check made in the next hour. Each user can only take advantage of this effect once per day.

*Caster Level:* 3rd; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Guidance (Spell)|guidance]]**; Market Price:* 750 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 74
